title: Paper Plane
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Take-out, Asian, French, Fusion
description: (Update April 2016: Was previously listed as serving meat; however it has been reported to HappyCow by the restaurant they are a vegetarian restaurant with 80% of the menu being vegan. They use eggs and sometimes cheese. Cow milk is available on request only but they use only plant-based milk in their recipes.) Est. 2015 modern decor and a Mediterranean feel with hanging plants and bamboo. Simple meals such as avocado toast, bo bun and Thai curry, plus has fresh juices and hot drinks.
